job_description: hardware engineering job for the role Production Operator

• Minimum QualificationsGood understanding of how to test image and video quality characteristics in the field, including Auto Exposure, Auto Focus, and White Balance.
• Understanding the Human Visual System and how it impacts our perception of photos and videos about the real-world Experience.
• Knowledge of some photography lab equipment and experience operating camera systems in a lab.
• Excellent sense of photography, videography, and cinematography on both technical and artistic levels, and understanding of what makes a good photograph or video.
